content: **crocheted and felted sitting mat in drops snow the piece is worked from the center outwards ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-670 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements after felting approx 58 cm = 22 3/4 in diameter measurements before felting approx 41 cm = 16 1/8 in diameter **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 200 g color 86 copper 200 g color 85 curry **crochet gauge ** 12 double crochets in width and 6 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 diagram a 1 measures approx 11 cm = 4 3/8 in diameter crochet hook drops crochet hook size 6 mm = us j/10 hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
